question: Which stage of a frog's life cycle can be compared to a plant seed growing into a new plant?
candidate_answers: (A) when frog eggs are laid in water (B) when frog eggs hatch into tadpoles (C) when tadpoles live in water and breathe with gills (D) when frogs use lungs for breathing out of water
answer: when frogs use lungs for breathing out of water
label: D
